item.title: Tulsi Gabbard revokes security clearances of 37 US intelligence officials
item.description: The director of national intelligence accuses the officials, who served under Biden and Obama, of politicising intelligence for partisan or personal g...

item.title: Israeli military says first stages of assault on Gaza City have begun
item.description: Call-up letters have gone out to 60,000 reservists to bolster an operation which is expected to last until next year.

item.title: Israel approves controversial West Bank settlement project
item.description: The Palestinian Authority says the decision is illegal and will "destroy" the prospects for a two-state solution.

item.title: Watch: JD Vance heckled as he meets National Guard in Washington DC
item.description: Protesters shouted at Vance, Pete Hegseth and Stephen Miller as they entered DC's largest rail hub.

item.title: Fire still burning in one of world's tallest trees after three days
item.description: With about 50 ft already lost, the fire may impact the Doerner Fir's standing in global height rankings, officials say.
